name: The Witching Hour (Velvet Spectrum Games)
description:
Marcus and Adrian decided to go to Adrian's manor up in the hills to go ghost hunting early in the morning. 'Twas a night on 2:30AM when they arrived. However, things take a sudden turn for the worse after the 3AM curse comes true. Together, they must survive till 4:00AM, surrounded by ghosts, demons and the fear of possession.

WARNING: THIS GAME IS NOT FOR THE FAINT OF HEART. THIS GAME CONTAINS

Flashing lights

Sudden noises

Loud noises

High frequencies

Intense jumpscares
